newsitem.title: FINLAND: Partek sells 52 pct of French Morin.
newsitem.headline: Partek sells 52 pct of French Morin.

text.p: Finnish building materials and cargo handling equipment group Partek Oy Ab said in a statement on Friday it had sold 52 percent of its holding in French precast concrete unit Morin Systeme Architechtonique (MSA) SA.
"The transaction will not have a significant effect on Partek's result," Partek said. The price or other financial details of the deal was not given.
Partek said it had sold the majority of Morin to the unit's local management and a private French investor.
Morin produces precast facade and stair elements, Partek said, but did not give the annual sales or any other financial information about the French company.
